Package com.company

Class Compressor

java.lang.Object
com.company.Compressor
public class Compressor
extends java.lang.Object
A class containing compressing and decompressing methods for a given encoding based on a huffman tree.

  • Method Details

    • getCodesFromFile

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,​java.lang.String> getCodesFromFile​(java.lang.String nameOfTxtFileWithCodes)
      Fetches a map containing a character and its corresponding encoding from a txt file in trees directory
      Parameters:
      nameOfTxtFileWithCodes - name of the txt file in trees directory (without .txt)
      Returns:
      a map containing a characters as a keys and its corresponding encoding as values

    • compressText

      public void compressText​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String nameOfFile)
      Saves a compressed version of a given text as a .bin file after checking if it already exists.
      Parameters:
      text - text to compress using the specified map
      nameOfFile - name of the file to be saved in ./resources/compressed_texts/ without the extension

    • decompressAndSaveAs

      public java.lang.String decompressAndSaveAs​(java.lang.String subdir, java.lang.String compressedFileName, java.lang.String decompressedFileName)
      decompresses a file from ./resources/compressed_texts + subdir and saves it in ./resources/
      Parameters:
      subdir - subdirectory of resources file where the compressed file is
      compressedFileName - name of the compressed file (without .bin)
      decompressedFileName - name that will be given to the decompressed file (without .txt)
      Returns:
      a text of the decompressed file
